sentences.sContent: Her dentist advised that the problem might be coming from her thicker-than-average lingual frenulum.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her dentist advised that the problem might be coming from her thicker-than-average lingual frenulum.
sentences.sCn: 她的牙医说口语水平上不去的原因可能是她的舌系带比一般人的要厚。

remMethod.val: lingu (舌头， 引申为语言) + al (的) → 语言的

trans.tranOther: of or relating to the tongue or a part or structure resembling a tongue
